name: Khadum The Killer
description:
You're playing Khadum, a little guy who wants to take a walk in a national park. 

I make this game publicly available mostly as a learning resource. You can find the corresponding article on my website. This game was made following the great tutorial series made by Shaun Spalding (go check it out!)

Features
  • 2D Platformer
  • Ability to move, jump, pick up and fire a gun
  • Destructable boxes, enemies who fire back at you
  • 3 levels
  • 2 different endings depending on your actions
  • Simple menu system
  • Saves automatically the score and level
  • Playable on Windows
Tools Used
  • Game Maker Studio 2 for the game itself
  • Krita for the designs
  • Bxfr for the sounds (and the wilhelm scream)
  • BoscaCeoil for the music
